label: Third-Person Side View Game POV
def_question: Is this a 2D or 3D gaming video where the camera is positioned at the side of the character?
alt_question: Does this video feature a side-scrolling third-person perspective?
Is the character viewed from a lateral angle in a gaming scene?
Is the game presented with a side-on camera perspective?
def_prompt: A third-person 2D side-view gaming video where the camera follows the character from a lateral perspective.
alt_prompt: A scene where the character moves side-to-side in a third-person game.
A 2D or 3D gaming video where the camera tracks the character from the side.
A game shot with a lateral perspective, commonly used in platformers or fighting games.
